code: import{Tooltip as BsTooltip}from"bootstrap";import React,{useEffect,useRef}from"react";export const Tooltip=p=>{const childRef=useRef(undefined);useEffect(()=>{const t=new BsTooltip(childRef.current,{title:p.text,placement:p.placement,trigger:"hover"});return()=>t.dispose();},[p.text]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.cloneElement(p.children,{ref:childRef});};
